Nerangs.ab: rāspīg parāhōm pad dast ī hōy abar griftan pad gāh ī frabardārān šawišn dast čahār angust az barsom dūr dārišn yō. nō. bē gōwišn tā gyāg parāhōm ul ō ī zōt dahišn yō nō aēuuō at̰ tē uiiē ϑrāiiōidiiāi tūrahe maṇdāidiiāi xšuuīdəm haptāždiiāi nauua dasme yōi və̄ yaēϑma

"The rāspīg should take the parāhōm with the left hand and has to go to the place of the frabardarān. He has to hold his hand at a distance of four finger away from the barsom. He has to recite yō nō until the moment when he has to give the parāhōm to the zōt: yō nō aēuuō at̰ tē uiiē ϑrāiiōidiiāi tūrahe maṇdāidiiāi xšuuīdəm haptāždiiāi nauua dasme yōi və̄ yaēϑma"
rāspīg parāhōm ul stānišn ud bē gāh ī frabardārān šawišn ud bē gōwišn yō nō aēuuō at̰ tē uiiē ϑrāiiōidiiāi tūrahe maṇdāidiiāi xšuuīdəm haptāždiiāi nauua dasme yōi və̄ yaēϑma.
"The rāspīg has to take the parāhōm, go to the place of the frabardārān and say: yō nō aēuuō at̰ tē uiiē ϑrāiiōidiiāi tūrahe maṇdāidiiāi xšuuīdəm haptāždiiāi nauua dasme yōi və̄ yaēϑma"
